live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35406.summary: Some customers in the Johnson Heights and Fleetwood area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35406.title: Mar 26 – Surrey (Johnson Heights, Fleetwood) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: We continue to track multiple hydro related outages in the Winnipeg region. Shaw techs are on standby to assist with restoring our services when Manitoba Hydro completes their repairs. Thank you for your patience.
We await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
35411.title: Mar 26 – Winnipeg  | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
